member.name: T:SlowFox.ExcludeMocksAttribute
member.summary: The attribute used to exclude specific types from being created as mock objects

member.name: P:SlowFox.ExcludeMocksAttribute.Types
member.summary: The list of types to be excluded

member.name: M:SlowFox.ExcludeMocksAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor for the attribute, defining no types to be excluded

member.name: M:SlowFox.ExcludeMocksAttribute.#ctor(System.Type[])
member.summary: The constructor for the attribute, defining one or more types to be excluded
member.param: The array of types to be excluded
member.remarks: All excluded types will be created as parameters on the generated Create method

member.name: T:SlowFox.InjectMocksAttribute
member.summary: The attribute used to specify the type for which the mocks will be generated

member.name: P:SlowFox.InjectMocksAttribute.Type
member.summary: The type for which the mocks will be generated

member.name: M:SlowFox.InjectMocksAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor for the attribute, defining no type

member.name: M:SlowFox.InjectMocksAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: The default constructor for the attribute, defining the type for which the mocks will be generated
